name: MADELA
description:
Play as Aiden, an ordinary young man, follows the Specific storyline based on reality and Including some parts of Istanbul.


■ Features
• Some parts of the city of Istanbul designed.
• The game has been produced creatively and also based on reality.


Aiden is the main character who study computer science!



Note: before buying this game please read the Early Access section, This game will get the update every month. your supports and feedbacks will help us for making this game better.
